resources.string: In turn, set the starting point and destination by tapping on label, type and choose a place on suggested list. A path will display on map

Tap on the scanner button on the right of starting location to open QR-Scanner, scan a QR-Code around you, a direction guide will display. Keep scanning QR-Code and follow the guide to reach the destination
After setting the destination, tap on Navigate button below to be navigated by AR
